reviewText: It's a cult classic do I need say anymore
They did a great job clearing up this cult classic. The desert scenes are very defined with more color now. Plus the Charlotte Rampling hitch hiker scene is added.
its a movie I saw as a teenager at the drive in and always wanted to have it
From what I understand this is the original 1971 version of the greatest car chase.  I've been waiting a long time to find this,  and now I have On Amazon
